I cant run game! I have error: Windows cannot find 'lag_win32_public_dev.exe'.

PLEASE HELP!!!!

I cant run game! I have error: Windows cannot find 'lag_win32_public_dev.exe'.

c:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\zero gear>cd /d [Lead and Glod folder]

sry for SPAM

JopeCRO  - Trying taking everything that's extracted after you mount and install the game and put it in the SteamApps\Common\Zero Gear folder. I originally got the same error but after I did that it worked just fine.

JopeCRO, the problem is with yout ZeroGear.bat file. If you installed the game in "C:\Program Files\Lead and Gold" for example, the ZeroGear.bat file should be:

cd /d D:\Games\Lead and Gold
start lag_win32_public_dev.exe
exit

JopeCRO, if you installed the game in "C:\Program Files\Lead and Gold" for example, your ZeroGear.bat file should contain:

cd /d C:\Program Files\Lead and Gold
start lag_win32_public_dev.exe
exit
